item.title: Lone Sol v1.0.1 - Patchnotes
item.description: Patchnotes: RoBo can now hover for 1.0s longer. RoBo has a higher energy generation. RoBo has a reduced energy drain...

item.title: Lone Sol v1.0.0 - (Demo Day Release)
item.description: What is Lone Sol? Lone Sol is an upcoming narrative-driven exploration game created by [NAME_HERE].games, a team of final-year students from Falmouth University. Set in the Renaissance-inspired solar...
